title: Manual Sanity Checklist
description: Create a comprehensive manual sanity checklist document for pre-release regression testing across all target devices.
acceptance_criteria: Device coverage: iPhone SE, iPhone 14, Pixel 7, iPad, Desktop Chrome, Desktop Firefox
Section per hub: Shopping, Tasks, Vouchers, Reservations
Section for cross-cutting: navigation, responsive, i18n/RTL, offline behavior
Each check item has: description, expected result, pass/fail checkbox
Visual regression checks for card layouts, modals, forms in both LTR and RTL
completion_summary: SANITY_CHECKLIST.md created in repo root. Covers: Authentication (7 checks), Shopping Hub (23 checks — sub-hub nav, active list CRUD, master list drawer, bubbles, auto-categorise), Tasks Hub (26 checks — create, manage, bulk edit, urgent aggregation), Vouchers Hub (20 checks), Reservations Hub (8 checks), Settings (4 checks), Cross-cutting (Navigation 4, Responsive 6, i18n/RTL 10, LTR regression 5, Offline 3, Visual regression snapshot table). Device matrix: iPhone SE, iPhone 14, Pixel 7, iPad, Desktop Chrome, Desktop Firefox. Each check has description + expected result + pass/fail checkbox. Sign-off table with release decision included.
notes: This is a document task — no code changes. The checklist should be usable by a non-developer.
